mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_SUB_TYPE , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.HIT , B.REG_ID , B.REG_DTTM , FILE_NO , FILE_NM , FILE_DIR FROM ks_board_activity B LEFT JOIN KS_FILE_activity F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND B.BOARD_TYPE = F.BOARD_TYPE AND B.BOARD_SUB_TYPE = F.BOARD_SUB_TYPE AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND B.BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_SUB_TYPE , REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , AR.REG_ID AS REPLY_REG_ID , AR.REG_DTTM AS REPLY_REG_DTTM FROM ks_board_activity A join ks_board_activity_reply AR ON A.board_type = AR.board_type AND A.board_sub_type = AR.board_sub_type WHERE A.use_yn = 'Y' AND AR.USE_yN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND A.BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} ORDER BY AR.REG_DTTM
